topComments.author: Richard Tong
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este √© um √≥timo parque com muito espa√ßo para relaxar ou caminhar ao redor do lago. Viemos aqui para passear com nosso cachorro e agora beb√™. Voc√™ pode andar de bicicleta, jogar basquete, t√™nis e at√© nadar na piscina (antes de drenar a piscina para o inverno, voc√™ pode trazer seu cachorro). Voc√™ pode fazer churrasco e para reuni√µes maiores h√° abrigos para alugar. Voc√™ pode at√© alugar um local para o seu RV. Fora de Sheridan e 95.  (Original) This is great park with a lot of space to relax or walk around the lake. We come here to walk our dog and now baby. You can ride your bike, play basketball, tennis and even go swimming in the pool (before they drain the pool for winter, you can bring your dog). You can bbq and for bigger gatherings there are shelters to rent. You can even rent a spot for your RV. Off of Sheridan and 95.

topComments.author: Deborah Hoover
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Se Hospedaram no RV camping. N√ÉO h√° instru√ß√µes sobre como entrar no parque para RVs. O Google envia voc√™ para uma entrada que √© um port√£o trancado. A entrada principal parece que √© para o parque aqu√°tico. Felizmente, um vizinho gentil que vem aqui para passear diariamente me deu excelentes orienta√ß√µes - garantindo-me que essa era a √∫nica entrada para trailers e onde ficava o escrit√≥rio do acampamento. Trilhas maravilhosas para caminhadas e ciclismo e vistas encantadoras do enorme lago. Nosso local (pavimentado) era um pull-in de frente para o lago - espa√ßoso, com um p√°tio muito grande. As conex√µes est√£o na extremidade traseira do local (fora da estrada). Algumas pessoas precisavam de 4+ extens√µes para sua mangueira de esgoto. Eu recomendo este parque.  (Original) Stayed at the RV campground. NO directions on how to get into the park for RVs. Google sends you to an entrance that is a locked gate. The main entrance looks like it is for the water park. Fortunately, a kind neighbor who comes here to walk daily gave me excellent directions - assuring me that this was the only entrance for RVs and where the campground office was. Wonderful trails for walking and biking and lovely views of the huge lake. Our (paved) site was a pull-in facing the lake - spacious with a very large patio. The hook-ups are at the far back end of the site (off roadway). Some people needed 4+ extensions for their sewer hose. I would highly recommend this park.

topComments.author: Tania B
topComments.comment: This is an overall park rating.  1. The park itself is nice, with many scenic areas and several trails, the paths wind around the park nicely.  2. The playground is clean and nicely shades for kids however all benches are directly in sun.  3. The Safety Town area needs repairs but is a nice pretend play area for the kids.  4. The exercise area is a plus and well shaded.  5. Castaway Island is the highlight of the park -the prices are fair, the waterpark is clean and well supervised, i felt safe being there alone with 2 kids. I was surprised that they didn't offer to sell towels on site - would be a great revenue generating source that could double as memorabilia for visits.  6. RV campground - the spaces are pull through, no proper shade nor privacy (there is a trail around the lake where passerbys can just freely peer into your camper) and the train tracks directly behind the rv site area is a nuisance especially at night when trying to sleep. There are 5g towers all over the park which I'm not a personal fan of. The laundry facility is in need of some TLC. What i did appreciate and love that seems to be unique to this particular campground are the trash and recycling cans at every other site and that they practically cleaned them out every other day!  I wouldn't stay here again as an RVer but would definitely come back for the Castaway Island Waterpark.  ** my son scraped his knee while at park, i was able to use some of the beautiful Bidens alba (spanish needles) that are all over to stop his bleeding- the plant has natural styptic and antibacterial/fungal properties.

topComments.author: Isaac Rampton
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Grande parque com boas trilhas para caminhada. Estacionamento excelente e h√° muitas mesas de piquenique e pavilh√µes para comer ou passear. O parque nunca fica muito lotado e as pessoas s√£o muito amig√°veis. H√° uma boa quantidade de patos e esquilos no parque, mas nenhum √© muito chato. No geral, o parque TY √© um parque excelente. The park is never too crowded and the people are pretty friendly. There is a good amount of ducks and squirrels at the park, but none are too annoying. Overall TY park is an excellent park.

topComments.author: Alessandra Radhe
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) 2022 Ano ap√≥s minha revis√£o anterior, com meu segundo filho, estou ainda mais decepcionado com o novo playground. Acho perigoso para os pequenos e chato para os mais velhos. Atendeu apenas a faixa et√°ria de 3 a 6 anos. .  Nos fins de semana fica lotado de crian√ßas mais velhas cujos pais est√£o em algum outro lugar do parque fazendo churrasco. Eles n√£o t√™m id√©ia de como seus filhos est√£o se comportando, e geralmente essas crian√ßas mais velhas n√£o prestam aten√ß√£o √† seguran√ßa de outras crian√ßas e brincam grosseiramente.  Ame o parque embora! _____ 2019 aqui hoje foi √≥timo como sempre! Amo este parque. Estou decepcionado porque eles constru√≠ram um novo playground e destru√≠ram o antigo que inclu√≠a uma √°rea para beb√™s. o novo √© para crian√ßas com mais de 2 anos e n√£o tem baloi√ßos nem nada para beb√©s. Os balan√ßos s√£o uma √≥tima maneira de desenvolver o equil√≠brio e a coordena√ß√£o. Eu me pergunto por que o foram removidos. Vou procurar um parque com parque infantil para beb√©s e baloi√ßos  (Original) 2022 Year after my previous review,  with my second child, I'm even more disappointed about the new playground. I find it dangerous for little ones, and boring for older ones.  It only suitd the 3-6 age group. .  On weekends it is crowded with older children whose parents are somewhere else in the park barbecueing. They have no idea how their children are behaving, and usually these older kids do not play attentionto other children's safety and play roughly.  Love the park though! _____ 2019 here today was great as usual! Love this park. I am disappointed because they have built a new playground and destroyed the old one that included an area for babies. the new one is for children older than 2 years, and doesn't have any swings or anything for babies. The swings are a great way to develop balance and coordination.  I wonder why the have been removed.  I will be looking for a park with a playground for babies and with swings
